content: Policy bulletin 2024-041 issued revised documentation requirements for pelvic floor dysfunction treatments under PFD-312. Effective July 1st, all claims must include: 1) Pre-treatment urodynamic study results 2) Signed functional improvement plan 3) Monthly progress notes using standardized assessment tool available at prhs.com/forms/pfd. Enforcement grace period through September 30th for existing patients like #M482-91B transitioning care plans.
